text:
When I first heard about Product-Led Growth, I called it one of those many fads. 

It didn't make sense to me that a product could drive growth without being marketing-led or sales-led.

But, many companies are adopting this in their GTM. And this shows that PLG is here to stay.

But, if this is the new reality, how does marketing (and content marketing to be precise) need to adjust.

Because, let's face it, BEFORE you can use your product to acquire and activate new users - as PLG works, they must find it.

Marketing isn't static; it's dynamic. And the needed content marketing dynamism I found will work in this PLG era is:

Product-Led Storytelling.

I shared about it (and how you can adjust) in my article on OpenView Partners:

<https://openviewpartners.com/blog/product-led-storytelling/|https://openviewpartners.com/blog/product-led-storytelling/>
